hadiths.text: Narrated `Abdullah:I visited the Prophet (ﷺ) during his illness and touched him while he was having a fever. I said to him, "You have a high fever; is it because you will get a double reward?" He said, "Yes. No Muslim is afflicted with any harm, but that his sins will be annulled as the leave of a tree fall down

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يُقَالُ لِلْمَرِيضِ وَمَا يُجِيبُ
chapter.eng-name: What should be said to a patient and what should be his answer
